mapper.insert: insert into board_profile(pageUserEmail, pageUserName, profileImage, boardNum, follower, nickname) values(#{pageUserEmail}, #{pageUserName}, 'person.png', 0, 0, #{nickname})
mapper.update: update board_profile set follwer=follwer+1 where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail}
update board_profile set follwer=follwer-1 where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail}
update board_profile set boardNum=boardNum+1 where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail}
update board_profile set boardNum=boardNum-1 where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail}
update board_profile set profileImage=#{profileImage} where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail}
mapper.insert: insert into board_story(pageUserEmail, num, subject, content, likecount, registration, tag) values(#{pageUserEmail}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content},0,sysdate,#{tag})
insert into board_imagefile(pageUserEmail, num, saveFileName, originalFileName) values(#{pageUserEmail}, #{num}, #{saveFileName}, #{originalFileName})
insert into board_comment(pageUserEmail, num, nickname, bcomment, comment_num) values(#{pageUserEmail}, #{num},#{nickname}, #{bcomment}, #{comment_num})
mapper.select: select pageUserEmail, pageUserName, profileImage, boardNum, follower, nickname from board_profile where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail}
select pageUserEmail, pageUserName, profileImage, boardNum, follower, nickname from board_profile where pageUserEmail like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select num, saveFileName from board_imagefile where saveFileName like '%' || 'main' || '%' and pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} order by num desc
select subject, content, likecount, registration, tag from board_story where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num}
select pageUserEmail,num, nickname, bcomment,comment_num from board_comment where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num} order by comment_num asc
select saveFileName from board_imagefile where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num}
mapper.update: update board_story set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, tag=#{tag} where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num}
mapper.delete: delete board_story where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num}
delete board_imagefile where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num}
delete board_comment where pageUserEmail=#{pageUserEmail} and num=#{num} and comment_num=#{comment_num}
